member.name: T:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject
member.summary: DMS metadata object

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.LARGE_DATASET_ARCHIVE_THRESHOLD_GB
member.summary: If a dataset archive task involves more 15 GB of data, only archive the root directory and the QC directory Use property SkippedDatasetArchiveSubdirectories to view the skipped subdirectory names

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.MAX_FILES_TO_ARCHIVE
member.summary: Maximum number of files to archive
member.remarks: If uploading an entire dataset directory and all of its subdirectories via a DatasetArchive operation, this value applies to all files in the dataset directory (and subdirectories) If uploading just one dataset subdirectory via an ArchiveUpdate operation, this value applies to all files in that subdirectory

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.SOURCE_DIRECTORY_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: Error message thrown when the dataset directory is not found

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.TOO_MANY_FILES_TO_ARCHIVE
member.summary: Error message thrown when the dataset directory has too many files to archive

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.UNDEFINED_EUS_OPERATOR_ID
member.summary: Error message thrown when the dataset instrument operator does not have an EUS person ID

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.EUS_PORTAL_URL
member.summary: URL of the EUS website

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.HASHING_FILES
member.summary: Text to show when reporting progress

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.mRemoteCacheInfoFilesToRetrieve
member.summary: List of remote files that were found using CacheInfo files

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.mRemoteCacheInfoLockFiles
member.summary: Keys in this dictionary are lock directory share paths (for example \\proto-6\DMS_LockFiles) Values are the corresponding lock file info object

member.name: T:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.ArchiveModes
member.summary: Archive modes

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.ArchiveModes.archive
member.summary: Archive files (initial push of a dataset's files into MyEMSL)

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.ArchiveModes.update
member.summary: Add/update a dataset's files

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.DatasetName
member.summary: Dataset name

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.EUSInfo
member.summary: EUS Info

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.JobNumber
member.summary: Job number (in the DMS_Capture database)

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.IgnoreMaxFileLimit
member.summary: When true, allow over 500 files to be pushed to MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.IgnoreMyEMSLFileTrackingError
member.summary: when True, allow the ingest step to proceed, even if MyEMSL is tracking fewer files than expected for a given dataset

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.ManagerName
member.summary: Manager name

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.MetadataObject
member.summary: Object that tracks the upload details, including the files to upload
member.remarks: The information in this dictionary is translated to JSON; Keys are key names; values are either strings or dictionary objects or even a list of dictionary objects

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.SkippedDatasetArchiveSubdirectories
member.summary: Subdirectory names that were skipped during a DatasetArchive task because we're pushing more than 15 GB of data

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.TotalFileSizeToUpload
member.summary: Number of bytes to upload

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.TotalFileCountNew
member.summary: Number of new files pushed to MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.TotalFileCountUpdated
member.summary: Number of files updated in MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.TraceMode
member.summary: True to enable trace mode

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.UseTestInstance
member.summary: True to use the Test instance

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.MetadataObjectJSON
member.summary: Retrieve the metadata JSON as a string

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.#ctor(Pacifica.Core.Configuration,System.String,System.Int32,PRISM.FileTools)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.SetupMetadata(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Boolean@,System.String@)
member.summary: Construct the metadata that will be included with the ingested data
member.param: Output: set to true if the job should be failed
Output: explanation of the critical error

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.BytesToGB(System.Int64)
member.summary: Convert a file size in bytes to gigabytes

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.CollectFileInformation(Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.ArchiveModes,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Find all of the files in the path to be archived
member.param: Archive for the initial archive of a dataset, or update for updating a specific subdirectory
True to find files in all subdirectories
member.returns: List of files to be archived

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.CompareDatasetContentsWithMyEMSLMetadata(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Pacifica.Core.FileInfoObject},Pacifica.Upload.Upload.UploadMetadata,System.Boolean@,System.String@)
member.summary: Query server for files and hash codes
member.param: Output: set to true if the job should be failed
Output: explanation of the critical error
member.returns: List of files that need to be uploaded

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.CreateLockFiles
member.summary: Create lock files for the files in mRemoteCacheInfoFilesToRetrieve

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.DeleteLockFiles
member.summary: Delete lock files tracked by mRemoteCacheInfoLockFiles

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.FileHashExists(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo},System.String)
member.summary: Return true if fileVersions has a file with the given hash
member.returns: True if a match is found, otherwise false

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.FindDatasetFilesToArchive(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},Pacifica.Upload.Upload.UploadMetadata@)
member.summary: Find new or updated files to archive

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.GetDatasetFileCountExpectedInMyEMSL(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Query the DMS_Capture database to determine the number of files that MyEMSL should be tracking for this dataset
member.param: Number of times to try again if the data cannot be retrieved
member.returns: Number of files that should be in MyEMSL for this dataset; -1 if an error

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.GetDatasetFilesInMyEMSL(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Find files in MyEMSL associated with the given dataset ID
member.returns: Dictionary of files in MyEMSL; keys are relative file paths (Unix style paths) and values are file details Returns null if MyEMSL does not return a valid response

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.GetDatasetYearQuarter(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Get the dataset date-code text, e.g. 2040_4

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.GetFilesToIgnore
member.summary: Get a list of file names that we can ignore when transferring data to MyEMSL or comparing files on disk to files in MyEMSL

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.DMSMetadataObject.ValidateCertFile(System.String)
member.summary: Validate that the MyEMSL certificate file exists
member.returns: True if the cert file is found, otherwise false

member.name: T:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo
member.summary: Metadata for files in MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.Filename
member.summary: Filename

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.FileID
member.summary: File ID in MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.HashSum
member.summary: File hash (typically SHA-1)

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.HashType
member.summary: Hash type

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.Created
member.summary: Time created in MyEMSL
member.remarks: Use UpdateRemoteFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.Updated
member.summary: Time updated in MyEMSL (typically identical to Created)
member.remarks: Use UpdateRemoteFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.Deleted
member.summary: Time deleted in MyEMSL; null if not deleted
member.remarks: Use UpdateRemoteFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.FileCreationTime
member.summary: Original file creation time (on the host system prior to MyEMSL ingest)
member.remarks: Use UpdateSourceFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.FileLastWriteTime
member.summary: Last modification time (on the host system prior to MyEMSL ingest)
member.remarks: Use UpdateSourceFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.Size
member.summary: File size, in bytes

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.SubDir
member.summary: Subdirectory (subfolder) below the dataset folder

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.TransactionId
member.summary: Transaction ID
member.remarks: All files uploaded in a given batch will have the same transaction ID

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.Dataset
member.summary: Dataset Name

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.DatasetID
member.summary: DatasetID

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.Instrument
member.summary: Instrument name for this file
member.remarks: Will be blank for data package files

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.DatasetYearQuarter
member.summary: Dataset year-quarter string, for example 2013_3
member.remarks: Will be blank for data package files

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithDataset
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the dataset name

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithDatasetUnix
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the dataset name

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithInstrumentAndDatasetUnix
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the instrument, year_quarter, and dataset

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithInstrumentAndDatasetWindows
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the instrument, year_quarter, and dataset
member.remarks: Uses Windows-style slashes. Note that instrument IMS_TOF_4 was renamed to IMS04_AgTOF05 in 2013, and thus there are datasets with files associated with both instruments in MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.RelativePathWindows
member.summary: Path to the file, relative to the dataset folder

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.UpdateRemoteFileTimes(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Update times the file was created, updated, and optionally deleted in MyEMSL

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.UpdateSourceFileTimes(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Update file creation and modification times using the string values reported by MyEMSL

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLFileInfo.ToString
member.summary: Return the relative file path

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLUploader.#ctor(Pacifica.Core.Configuration,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},PRISM.FileTools)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMS_Metadata.MyEMSLUploader.SetupMetadataAndUpload(Pacifica.Core.Configuration,Pacifica.Upload.TarStreamUploader.UploadDebugMode,System.String@)
member.summary: Look for files to upload, compute a SHA-1 hash for each, compare those hashes to existing files in MyEMSL, and upload new/changed files
member.param: Set to eDebugMode.CreateTarLocal to authenticate with MyEMSL, then create a .tar file locally instead of actually uploading it Set to eDebugMode.MyEMSLOfflineMode to create the .tar file locally without contacting MyEMSL
member.returns: True if success, false if an error

member.summary: Gets a job parameter
member.param: Value to return if the parameter does not exist
member.returns: Parameter value if found, otherwise empty string

member.summary: Gets a job parameter
member.param: Value to return if the parameter does not exist
member.returns: Parameter value if found, otherwise empty string
